Text: Tech-9 el unico desesperado eres tu.....ese odio hacia lo español esta claro que es producto de la envidia que sientes hacia nosotros y nuestra tierra....jodete y deja de molestar eres un puto perdedor no consigues nada con tu actitud.

¿quien te llamò racista?...te llamè desesperado y envidioso por no conseguir nada con tu actitud.....que no te gustan nuestros torrents es tu problema (no los bajes), la mayoria no piensa asi...mira el topp.
Que gaudesquis d'un bon dia...adeu.

¿Quien te ha dicho que nuestros torrents estan dirigidos a vosotros?....si no entiendes español y quieres bajàrtelos....acude a la escuela y lo aprendes.
Adeu.

hey pctorrent, dont jump on other people because they say what they think. And insulting the other person makes you a raceist as well. just because you are spanish doesn't mean you have the privilegue to tell every white man or woman he or she is araceist for telling you what they think about your torrent. That makes you only a raceist, a loser, and not to menation a crybaby, because if you react strongly when they tell you nice words it means, as Tech-9 said, that they are right, and you dont have the guts to admit it, no cojones, and if someone is a puto it is you. assholes like you should be terminated for all times.
